section: By this Agreement the Members enter into a joint venture (the "Venture") in accordance with the laws of the State of Florida. The rights and obligations of the Members will be as stated in the applicable legislation of the State of Florida (the "Act") except as otherwise provided here.
explanation: This section states that the joint venture will be governed by Florida law, except as otherwise provided in the agreement. However, it does not specify which specific laws or provisions of Florida law will apply. This lack of clarity can create ambiguity and uncertainty, as the parties may have different interpretations of which laws are applicable.

section: The business name of the Venture will be BM&V2GO.
explanation: The agreement states that the business name will be BM&V2GO, but there is no further clarification or definition of what this name represents or how it relates to the members. This lack of information creates an ambiguity, as it is unclear if this is the legal name of the entity or just a DBA.

section: The Purpose of the Venture will be determined by the Managers.
explanation: This section states that the purpose of the joint venture will be determined by the managers. However, it does not provide any guidelines, limitations, or criteria for the managers to consider when determining the purpose. This lack of specificity creates a significant ambiguity, as the managers could potentially define the purpose in a way that is inconsistent with the intentions of the members or the overall scope of the agreement.

section: The duration of this Venture (the "Term") will begin on March 1, 2020 and continue in full force and effect until February 28, 2025 or as otherwise provided in this Agreement.
explanation: The clause states the venture will last until February 28, 2025, "or as otherwise provided in this Agreement." However, there are no other sections that definitively provide an alternative end date. This creates an ambiguity and potential contradiction, as the end date is ostensibly fixed but also potentially subject to undefined alternative conditions.

section: Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the "Capital Contribution"): Member Contribution Description Agreed Value BorrowMoney.com, inc To be determined USD JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: The Contribution description for JVLS, LLC is not clear. It includes the $60,000 payment, + 10% of any generated gross revenue, and then lists the contribution total as $3,500,000. This is an inconsistency, as the description does not add up to the agreed value.

section: In the absence of a written agreement setting a value, the value of the Venture will be determined in a manner deemed appropriate by the remaining members. A withdrawing Member's interest will be determined at the discretion of the remaining members.
explanation: This section has the phrase that a withdrawing member's interest will be determined at the discretion of the remaining members. This section is far too vague and does not give enough information to proceed if this should occur. There should be a formula, procedure, or specific guidance in order to remove ambiguity from this situation.
